articles.title: Russia says nearly 700 more Mariupol fighters surrender - Reuters
articles.description: Nearly 700 more Ukrainian fighters surrendered at the Mariupol steelworks in the past 24 hours, Russia said on Wednesday, but leaders were reported to still be holed up inside, delaying the final end of Europe's longest and bloodiest battle for decades.
articles.content: KYIV/MARIUPOL, Ukraine, May 18 (Reuters) - Nearly 700 more Ukrainian fighters surrendered at the Mariupol steelworks in the past 24 hours, Russia said on Wednesday, but leaders were reported to still… [+6381 chars]

articles.title: Three Leinster players on European player of the year shortlist - The Irish Times
articles.description: Caelan Doris, Hugo Keenan and James Lowe, included on five-man shortlist
articles.content:
Three Leinster players, namely Caelan Doris, Josh van der Flier and James Lowe, have been included in the five-man shortlist for the 2022 EPCR European Player of the Year award.
